title: You own all the champions so you get a skin instead (actually I don't own them all)
body:
"You own all the champions so we're going to give you a mystery gift"
I don't own all the champions riot.  I don't own gnar kalista, bard, ekko or kench, so they give me a skin even when that statement is a lie?

replies.body:
Hey Zardous,

I can see why there might've been some confusion. Similar to how mystery gifts work, you're only eligible for mystery champions if the pool of available champions is 10 or more. Otherwise, you receive a mystery skin!
-_- seriously? so the 5 champs I don't own (after spending god knows how much IP/RP) to get to that point and I'm gimped out of one of the new ones, i knew it sounded too good to be true.
This could possibly the most stupid thing to complain about grow a pair you pansy boo hoo didnt get a champion
